website_summaries.verdict: Very secure and durable, this model is ideal for users who like the idea of the latest technology for easy yet secure access.
pros: Easy to conceal and nearly impossible to break into, this model features a 2-point deadbolt lock and biometric fingerprint scanning technology for a mid-range price
cons: Not as deep as our top recommended models

customer_reviews.title: A great value for your valuables
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation; solid design. It is so airtight you have to "pull" to open the door. The fingerprint feature works great. I had a safe that used a keypad to input the combo. When the batteries died, in the closed position, we had to destroy the safe to get the contents. This safe has backup features in case the batteries die. It is deep enough to fit everything I wanted to put in it. It fits flush enough to the wall that makes it easy to hide it. A great value for your valuables.
customer_reviews.author: DorothyFeht

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for storing pistols
customer_reviews.text: I use this safe as storage for my hand guns to keep them locked up from untrained hands. I took the time to train the system to learn both of my index fingers from many different angles and positions. I would not recommend this safe if you have expensive valuables you are looking to protect from thieves. The door does not seal tight and I would suspect a determined thief would be able to pry the door open. I lined the metal shelves with a rubber mat similar to what you would put in your tool box. This helps to keep items in position so they don't slide when you open/close the door.
customer_reviews.author: S. S.

customer_reviews.title: Wife’s happy only our prints get in.
customer_reviews.text: First install I’ve done in a few years. Videos on YouTube and instructions in the box made this a 15 min install from measure to all set. Fits flush To drywall, between standard studs with 4 screws to hold it in place. Wife and I have a print. Kids are safe.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Features work well. Not hard to install. Biometric mechanism sticks out from unit/wall a half inch and inside middle shelf, so plan accordingly. Fingerprint reader has audio beep when detecting correct print; this can be disabled so you don't alert intruders. Not a deep safe, so fits between studs in wall, but that also means it doesn't hold much.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap marginally functional wall safe that is neither impenetrable or inconspicuous. It sticks out pretty far if its flush mounted and the biometrics work about 20% of the time. Do not buy this safe if you need the biometrics to work because it doesnt and you end up using the key all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: It's a good little safe to keep hidden
customer_reviews.text: It's a good little safe to keep hidden. Unfortunately, because my hands are in water so much and I read because of my age, I have to use the key lock. My fingerprints are too smooth. My husband can use the fingerprint reader okay. Wish I'd read more about it and gotten the keypad lock system. Not the fault of the company.
customer_reviews.author: LE King

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The fingerprint reader have difficulty remembering your fingerprint had needs constant resetting. If you purchase this unit make sure you scan all of you finger. Maybe one of them will open the safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Barlow

customer_reviews.title: good quality, inside is small but we can fit ...
customer_reviews.text: it does exactly as you would expect, good quality, inside is small but we can fit a lot of small boxes, shelves are adequate. i think for the money it is a damn good wall safe. I bolstered the installation with 2x4's top and bottom, screwing into them, then drilling and screwing through the front flange. Fingerprint reader is very good. Just one small issue - the fingerprint reader and the handle to open and close are smooth and you cannot get a good grip to open the safe. Buy a small stick on hook and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Abbott

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality little safe
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality little safe. Good value for the money. Only reason I didn't give it a 5 is that sometimes the biometric opener doesn't immediately recognize my finger and I have to try several times before it opens. Also, the mechanisms do stick out a ways on the front so you have to create a space or recess in the back of any door have hiding it to accommodate that.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia A.

customer_reviews.title: After only 2 years stoped working... dont buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works fine. Finger print makes this perfect. I recommend this to everyone. Updated 09/04/2017 After only 2 years stoped working and amazon saind they can do nothing because the product doesnt have warranty. Really frustrated with this my safety is there hooked to thw wall but doesnt lock even with the key. Dont buy it.
customer_reviews.author: rrebello

customer_reviews.title: Not great!
customer_reviews.text: The fingerprint reader will read my husbands finger print and mine and give the green light but will not unlock!! Very aggravating! There is a key to get in but obviously takes a lot longer. Would not have purchased if I knew thus was an issue!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Barska-please improve-thanks
customer_reviews.text: It's a great design and adequate room. The problems I ran into was fingerprint reader inconsistencies and the spin wheel for opening and securing it were difficult to say the least. Another option which some others have is a low intensity light and that's a real bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Nickels

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this safe because of a price drop after it was in my wish list for months. I think I know why the price dropped. It appears as though it is a unadvertised refurbished or some sort of open-box product. The package was in perfect shape (no obvious damage from shipping). The front of the safe has some dents and a scratch that looks like someone tried to repair it. Also, the fingerprint lock was not in "factory default mode". The safe is working fine, it's a shame it doesn't look like new.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Safe is nice. Like it and have been using it for ...
customer_reviews.text: Safe is nice. Like it and have been using it for 6 months now. The reason for the 4 stars is that I have repeatedly scanned my finger print, and erased it tryng to get it to reliably read my print and unlock on the first scan. It always takes 3-6 attempts before it unlocks. Otherwise, love the safe.
customer_reviews.author: Dave DeCandis

customer_reviews.title: okay product
customer_reviews.text: The only issue is the finger print recognizer doesn't work well, otherwise a good safe
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again. Easy to install. Directions only available online.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, but directions do not get delivered - nooooo directions. I had to go to the website to learn how to set the fingerprints and how to adjust the users. Is not an exact fit between standard 16" studs; there is a lot of play, but with a brace on the bottom (I used a couple "L" brackets) this product isn't moving any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: KPA

customer_reviews.title: Had it about 2 months now and it still is ...
customer_reviews.text: Had it about 2 months now and it still is working as advertised. I just wish the wife would finally make up her mind about the picture going over it...I wonder if Amazon has something for that.
customer_reviews.author: ricknstl

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, and great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the fingerprint reader is awesome. You can be in the safe quickly and easily. It does require a 1&1/2 inch deep picture if you want to cover it. Canvas pics on a wood frame at the dollar store work great, just cut the paper back off. Easy to install and program. Just be aware this is NOT a fireproof safe. Great deal for the money, if worked right can be a great stealth safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Biometric is great - needs craftsmanship :/
customer_reviews.text: Clunky, was crooked when purchased - and was lack luster. For the $198 I spent on it I expect a WHOLE LOT more - comparable safes are $40-$60 in wall - this one just added the biometric to it. I expected better quality...
customer_reviews.author: R. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great safe
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son & daughter-in-law's anniversary. My son mounted this in the wall and it looks and works wonderfully. They have a hand gun and 2 young children, so now I know it is safely locked away.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Will fit weapons, passports, and money. Have to have it bolted between to wall studs. Could be pried from wall but that all depends on how securely you install it. Would greatly recommend. Fingerprint recognition works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: sage

customer_reviews.title: Price competitive - setup easy - 95% on the fingerprint read...  I like it.  a little shallow on the depth.
customer_reviews.text: Price competitive. Setup easy. Seems to read my prints 95% - good enough for me. Retry 1 or 2 times no big deal. I cut a hold in the wall in the close - put my 3 pistols and 1 shelf left for whatever.
customer_reviews.author: SkyBlue

customer_reviews.title: Installed easily and works fine
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily and works fine. The door could very likely be pried apart as other reviews have mentioned, but it's an excellent safe to keep most people out. But, if someone really wants to get into the safe, I'm pretty sure they could.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Its a good safe. Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Its a good safe. Not the best quality, but still worth it. I need to use a penny to open the door as it doesn't line-up properly to open without dragging. The shelves are flimsy, but if you don't get in it daily then there is no problem with them.
customer_reviews.author: Craig H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made safe and extremely easy to install. Well here we are, one year later. I changed my 5 star review to 3 stars because my finger print scanner doesn't work 90% of the time. I tried to contact support, but I've had no luck there.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Logan

customer_reviews.title: in wall safe
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install. Took me less than 30 min and I was able to do it by myself. Measuring your hole correctly is the most critical step. Make sure you use a level too.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M. Fry

customer_reviews.title: Good Safe at a Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This wall safe is everything i expected. It is heavier than you might think. I installed it on an interior wall and had to create and add some framing to support it. Also, it holds up to 30 fingerprints. I scanned mine in many different positions and it works every time now. I really like this item and am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: FWRealtor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This safe is junk. The reader only works once after setting it up. I had to keep resetting the finger prints. I contacted the seller and tried all their suggestions and nothing worked. The best they could do was to only charge me $25 warranty fee plus I pay return shipping. Now I just use it as a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: How to Feel Safe!
customer_reviews.text: Installed and glad I have the item hidden in my house. Easy to install. Used my Multi-Max to cut the drywall, messy but effective.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this safe. I have one just like it in my other house. This one is a little different. When it reads you finger and unlocks you still have to turn the dial. My other one just unlocked for me.(thats why 4 stars) other wise its five. Obviously its a great company or I wouldn't have bought another safe.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Takes three or four tries to open it.
customer_reviews.text: Takes three or four tries to open it. It very seldom will recognize my wifes prints Do not bet your life on this to open in a hurry
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Hansen

customer_reviews.title: it came in perfect shape. install was super easy and fast
customer_reviews.text: i received my safe this morning. it came in perfect shape. install was super easy and fast. quality seems great.
customer_reviews.author: scott r.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this safe
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this safe. Easy to install and easy to set up. As others have commented, the fit is a bit off in one corner, but mine was not bad enough to cause me concern. I have had it a couple of months now and getting in and out of safe is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: TV

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty sweet! I got it for my boyfriend for Christmas and he can stop opening it! Believe it or not I cut the hole in the wall and drilled it into the studs! Amazing! It was easy to set up fingerprint too
customer_reviews.author: tawnee

customer_reviews.title: The lock was poorly assembled and its quality was not great either. I had to take the lock apart ...
customer_reviews.text: cheap build. The battery door broke off trying to install batteries. The lock was poorly assembled and its quality was not great either. I had to take the lock apart and reassemble it by tightening each screw and replacing ones that had fallen out. Choose another safe.
customer_reviews.author: Dawig

customer_reviews.title: Flawless and smooth!
customer_reviews.text: I have never had the safe malfunction once. I've had it for a year now and I open it once a week.
customer_reviews.author: EE2009

customer_reviews.title: A good investment.
customer_reviews.text: This was a really good purchase for the safety and security of important items. Instructions were easy to follow, operation and installation was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great safe for little stuff. Prescriptions, flash drives, watches ect...
customer_reviews.author: JDW, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Nice safe but doesn't work like I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to get fingerprint scanner to work. I'm down to just using the key
customer_reviews.author: Teeburt

customer_reviews.title: My second safe from this company. Fingerprint reader is ...
customer_reviews.text: My second safe from this company. Fingerprint reader is very reliable and quick to use. The safe is well made. The cut-out dimension is 13 1/2 " wide, which is narrower than most wall safes.
customer_reviews.author: SCshopper

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Setup was pretty simple. It is heavy. Bought this to put in a drawer under the bed. There is no handle to open the door with. Would work better if mounted upright. Going to have to figure out a way to mount a handle as the door is very heavy to open upwards with your fingertips. Also the locking mechanism takes up most of the center shelf so you really can't store a pistol in there. Finger print scanner is pretty reliable but not 100%. I would like to see a keypad as a backup. UPDATE: Finger print scanner rarely works on the first try. Often have to do it twice or on another finger.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Responds to fingerprint everytime. Only "downside" is the middle shelf is pretty much useless as the scanner part protrudes into most of that shelf when closed. Can easily fit 2 guns, amo, and other valuables on top and bottom shelfs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is just O.K.
customer_reviews.text: I like this safe. It was easy to install and operates as advertised. I give it 3 stars because the knob appears to be made of plastic. It feels loose when you turn it. Not what you would expect on a safe.
customer_reviews.author: jmor

customer_reviews.title: Everything is good except the knob is cheap plastic and feels like ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good except the knob is cheap plastic and feels like it's about to strip off of the screw that it's attached too.
customer_reviews.author: StarWalker

customer_reviews.title: decent safe
customer_reviews.text: not a bad safe. holds everything I want in it nicely. was easy to install. needs more instruction on how to load finger prints into memory. I had to set my fingers in several position before I was confident it would open every time I needed it to. even standing in different positions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong safe, consistent bio scanner.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, and works as advertised. I've purchased two more as gifts for my family. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: 24/7shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice wall safe. Reads my fingerprints first time every time.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander d Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible customer service. My safe will not open with fingerprints. I have reset it to factory default a number of times and nothing works. IT will only open with the key. Very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install, it fits perfectly. Now our valuables are safe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo R Ruvalcaba

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this safe. Fits in the wall perfect. Its not real big but its better then nothing
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Morris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This safe is easy to setup, easy to install and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I really like this safe
customer_reviews.text: I really like this safe. I bought it since I was very happy with the 4 gun fingerprint safe from the same company. The sensor has very good reliability. I always program 8/10 fingers and I regularly try to open it with the wrong fingers and it has never opened. As long as I put around 70% of my correct fingerprint on the sensor it opens every time. “60% of the time it works every time.”
customer_reviews.author: W. Lee

customer_reviews.title: The door isn't a perfect fit so a crow bar could fit under the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly constructed. The door isn't a perfect fit so a crow bar could fit under the door. The cover plate is not square to the door. The logo is crooked. And the plastic pieces to hold up the shelfs were broken. I saw other reviews from Dec 2014 which speak to shotty construction. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Szczepanek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect safe to store cash. Just wish it was fireproof
customer_reviews.author: Zayed A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install but sometimes you have to put finger ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but sometimes you have to put your finger on the set up couple of times to read your print
customer_reviews.author: WD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What more can I say when your dealing with professionals. Thanks...
customer_reviews.author: wali williams

customer_reviews.title: Works well. The logo is crooked but is just ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. The logo is crooked but is just a stick on. Only other complaint is that the knob is hard to grip.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a VERY cool safe. Works great and easy to program.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste you time or money!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful the shelves were welded in crooked the locking mechanism did not even lock it was completely broken. This was a cheaply made product.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Hruschka

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY, LOCKED ME OUT
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. IT MALFUNCTIONED AND LOCKED ME OUT. LUCKILY IT IS EXTREMELY EASE TO BREAK INTO WITH A HAMMER. WHICH ALSO IS NOT A GOOD QUALITY FOR A SAFE. KEY WOULDNT EVEN WORK.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint tech lacks.....
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but the fingerprint technology is low grade. It can take scanning of my fingerprint 8, 9, even 10 times before it finally recognizes it. I've even added additional fingers from both hands in the hopes that one of them will be read quickly, just not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Skurdalsvold

customer_reviews.title: Ver nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Item as described in summary. Very easy to program multiple fingerprints and simple to instal [if you have standard spaced studs]. I added a stick on hook to the front to expedite quick opening of the door in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ringham

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall Safe
customer_reviews.text: I was worried because there are not many reviews on this safe but once I got it I found that it was easy to setup and worked great. The reader always works even if you move your finger while its reading it . It beeps when it reads your finger letting you know it worked however, you have the option of turning of the beep if you don't want some one to hear you getting into your safe in the middle of the night.. Great safe well built super happy with it..
customer_reviews.author: peter Naranjo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: OMG, what a crock of poop - 2nd one came and it is junk with a capital S
customer_reviews.author: J. divecchio

customer_reviews.title: Nice Unit works well
customer_reviews.text: This is the second optical unit I have from this maker. First one was a stand alone for pistol storage.
customer_reviews.author: aatom

customer_reviews.title: The safe worked fine for 8 monthes until it stopped opening
customer_reviews.text: The safe worked fine for 8 monthes until it stopped opening. Called Barska, as the safe has one year warranty. I had to call the locksmith and send it back to Barska on my dime. I was told that the CFO wanted me to send it back after locksmith opened it, so that they would void the warranty as the safe was tampered with. Seemed like a good safe, but perhaps a shady company!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D. Reisman

product_meta.title: Barska Biometric Fingerprint Security Wall Safe 0.52 Cubic Ft
feature_bullets: Secure Storage: Our DOJ approved safe comes with a 120 fingerprint biometric module that is easy to program.
Adjustable Shelves: The safe comes with 2 removable shelves for convenience organizing.
Solid Construction: This safe is built with durable steel and dual built-in pry-resistant steel deadbolts.
Mounting: The safe is designed to be mounted on the wall with pre-drilled holes and hardware, easily concealed behind objects.
Right Opening: The door opens to the right.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
